ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] [egbarts] Changing computers
ygData.msgSnippet: Install EQ on the new computer, then copy over all the files in your old computers EQ directory to the new one.   This will move all your hot key setups as
ygData.messageBody:
Install EQ on the new computer, then copy over all the files in your old
computers EQ directory to the new one. This will move all your hot key
setups as well as saving you the trouble of spending an evening downloading
patches.

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 9:59 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] [egbarts] Changing computers


From: Papa Legba <legba@...>

TOtally non bardish, but you people seem to know everything. I got a
new computer (woohoo!) What is the best way to move EQ over to it? I
assume I will have to reinstall and wait about 10 hours getting
patched... Are there any files I should copy over?
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
